name: Airplane Flight: Pilot Sim 3D
description:
Fly high to the sky, fly through the clouds and complete missions!

Nowadays flights and airports became daily reality, but it’s still unbelievable that humanity reached the sky! You can sit comfortably in your armchair and admire clouds and top view – yes, if you are a passenger! What about becoming a pilot? Airplane Flight: Pilot Sim 3D – incredible simulator of a real plane!

You have to complete different tasks and missions. Fly through the rings, perform touchdown, score points! It’s time for stunt flying and aerobatic maneuvering – welcome to our pilots school!

Airplane Flight: Pilot Sim 3D GAME FEATURES:
- Real plane simulator 3D;
- Perform different tricks in the air;
- Complete missions and get points;
- Become a real pilot;
- Amazing graphics and sounds.

Airplane Flight: Pilot Sim 3D will bring you to the incredible world of fast flights and aerial acrobatics! Make your dream of pilot’s career come true and enjoy!
